description: Texty Notepad is designed to be a straightforward alternative to other text editors and word processors in Windows, allowing users to create basic documents. For example, users can create school notes, manuscripts, or step-by-step instructions with Texty Notepad and save them as TXTY files. Additionally, the text editor offers several basic features, including Dark Mode and the ability to save documents as plain text ( .txt ) files.
